topic.title: Errors with Zeronet
topic.body:
Hello, I am having a few problems with Zeronet. Can anybody give me any pointers on what I should do to fix it/ get rid of the notification every time? ZeroNet seems to be running completely fine. Thanks in advance!

`Internal error: ValueError: Expecting property name: line 5 column 3 (char 101)`
```
UiWebsocket.py line 83 > UiWebsocket.py line 267 > ContentFilterPlugin.py line 148 > SiteStorage.py line 307 > __init__.py line 291 > __init__.py line 339 > decoder.py line 364 > decoder.py line 380
```

I also cannot access Zeronet from the Tor Browser. I whitelisted 127.0.0.1 and the page will load with the logo in the top right corner, but nothing else will show up.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
Hello,
I keep getting this error every time I run ZeroNet. Can anybody give me any pointers on what I should do to fix it/ get rid of the notification every time? ZeroNet seems to be running completely fine. 

`Internal error: ValueError: Expecting property name: line 5 column 3 (char 101)`
```
UiWebsocket.py line 83 > UiWebsocket.py line 267 > ContentFilterPlugin.py line 148 > SiteStorage.py line 307 > __init__.py line 291 > __init__.py line 339 > decoder.py line 364 > decoder.py line 380
```
